      • getInstance

        public static HeadsUtils getInstance()
        Get the instance of this singleton class (or create a new one if none exist). If the class was never used before, it will log a warning that the default logger will be used.
        Returns:
        the instance of this singleton class

      • loadCategories

        public void loadCategories()
                    throws MalformedURLException,
                           IOException
        Load the categories from the internet. It uses the url links to the heads server, specified in the config.yml file
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the url from the config file was malformed
        IOException - if loading caused any IO error

      • loadCategories

        public void loadCategories(String predefinedUrl,
                           String customUrl)
                    throws MalformedURLException,
                           IOException
        Load the categories from the internet
        Parameters:
        predefinedUrl - link to the predefined categories API
        customUrl - link to the uncategorized API
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the supplied urls were malformed
        IOException - if loading caused any IO error

      • loadCategory

        public void loadCategory(String categoryName)
                  throws MalformedURLException,
                         IOException,
                         AuthenticationException
        Load one category from the internet. It uses the url links to the heads server, specified in the config.yml file
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the name of the category
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the url from the config file was malformed
        IOException - if loading caused any IO error
        com.github.cc007.headsplugin.exceptions.AuthenticationException - if a method is used that is not allowed in the current access mode
        AuthenticationException

      • loadCategory

        public void loadCategory(String predefinedUrl,
                         String customUrl,
                         String categoryName)
                  throws MalformedURLException,
                         IOException,
                         AuthenticationException
        Load one category from the internet
        Parameters:
        predefinedUrl - link to the predefined categories API
        customUrl - link to the uncategorized API
        categoryName - the name of the category
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the supplied urls were malformed
        IOException - if loading caused any IO error

      • getHeads

        public List<Head> getHeads(String headName)
                    throws MalformedURLException,
                           SocketTimeoutException,
                           IOException,
                           AuthenticationException
        Get all heads with a certain name
        Parameters:
        headName - the name of the heads
        Returns:
        all heads with a certain name
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the url from the config file was malformed
        SocketTimeoutException - if the website to which the url links doesn't respond
        IOException - if loading caused any IO error
        com.github.cc007.headsplugin.exceptions.AuthenticationException - if a method is used that is not allowed in the current access mode
        AuthenticationException

      • getHead

        public Head getHead(String headName)
             throws MalformedURLException,
                    SocketTimeoutException,
                    IOException,
                    AuthenticationException
        Get a specific head (first available head if there are more)
        Parameters:
        headName - the name of the head
        Returns:
        the head
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the url from the config file was malformed
        SocketTimeoutException - if the website to which the url links doesn't respond
        IOException - if loading caused any IO error
        com.github.cc007.headsplugin.exceptions.AuthenticationException - if a method is used that is not allowed in the current access mode
        AuthenticationException

      • getHead

        public Head getHead(String headName,
                    int index)
             throws MalformedURLException,
                    SocketTimeoutException,
                    IOException,
                    AuthenticationException
        Get a specific head (first available head if the index is higher than the number of heads with this head name)
        Parameters:
        headName - the name of the head
        index - number in the list of heads
        Returns:
        the head
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the url from the config file was malformed
        SocketTimeoutException - if the website to which the url links doesn't respond
        IOException - if loading caused any IO error
        com.github.cc007.headsplugin.exceptions.AuthenticationException - if a method is used that is not allowed in the current access mode
        AuthenticationException

      • saveHead

        public Head saveHead(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                     String headName)
              throws MalformedURLException,
                     SocketTimeoutException,
                     IOException,
                     AuthenticationException
        Add the head of the given player to the database under the given name
        Parameters:
        player - the player who's head will be added to the database
        headName - the name of the head that will be added to the database
        Returns:
        the head that was generated or null if the head could not be added to the database
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the url from the config file was malformed
        SocketTimeoutException - if the website to which the url links doesn't respond
        IOException - if loading caused any IO error
        com.github.cc007.headsplugin.exceptions.AuthenticationException - if a method is used that is not allowed in the current access mode
        AuthenticationException

      • getLogger

        public static Logger getLogger()
        Get the logger that is used by HeadsUtils and its dependent classes
        Returns:
        the logger

      • setDatabaseLoader

        public void setDatabaseLoader(DatabaseLoader loader)
        Set which database loader to use to load the heads from a database
        Parameters:
        loader - the loader to load the heads from a database
